function.name: pageinfo
function.description: Returns a list variable with specific info on the page object page such as: cookies, encoding, load time, title, status code, etc.

examples.example: { url = "http://www.xillio.com/", title = "Xillio", encoding = "UTF-8", contenttype = "text/html", loadtime = 275, requesturl = "http://www.xillio.com/", statuscode = 200, statusmessage = "OK", cookies = {} }
